channel.title: Can't enjoy RS
channel.description:
I can't enjoy the game anymore with my stats , however , I know that with high levels I could like go to bosses and shit... But getting high cb stats takes like a shitton of time I don't have because of school. My stats atm are like...a little bit over average I suppose...(IGN = jaghaxx).
My point is , to actually enjoy playing the game , you have to be like high stats in everything ; otherwise you'll just want to kill yourself trying to get high stats...
I don't want to ruin the game for the others by botting ; I'm entirely legit , but sure as hell I feel like I'm forced to bot...
I had a near - maxed account ( max melee cb stats , 90 pray , 86 mage and 92 range) and that one got banned because of the previous owner having quite a few offences ( and that was when jagex actually cared about their players). On that account I went to like , dks , kq , kbd and shit (gwd wasnt added back then) and I actually enjoyed the PvM which was only possible with high stats...
Am I the only one with this feeling?

item.title: Can't enjoy RS
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:19, topic:416039”][quote author=Cres link=topic=517979.msg3764327#msg3764327 date=1317099758]

I’m not selling my account , I didn’t spend 4.5 years on it just to sell it…
I’m not gonna bot either.
I just don’t know what to do though…I think soloing bandos with OVL’s and beast weapons would be a nice activity , but I cbf to play the game another 3 years to get those stats…

then don’t bot it, nor sell it;
Give it away to me :o

Whwich is like selling it for no money at all…

I think I’m just gonna fish with my account.
Sell to some guy over the internet , hit recovery after a month
That way they will train my account for me and I get some cash in the meanwhile xD
[/quote]
I think you can get banned here for that… best not to do that… or say it… + its risky, might not work, or charge back, debt, etc. Not worth it in any way.[/quote]

Dude , I’ve seen people write shit and get their accounts recovered ; thats not a problem.

Also , since I won’t be selling the acc here on mpsc there won’t be any problems

Read full topic

item.title: Can't enjoy RS
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

If you don’t enjoy your stats build them? Or do what I do and try to complete every quest. Please just don’t bot, they have really ruined the game, back in 2009 it was cute to see a few bots at yew and no oen cared, now all mosters ftp and about 70% of monsters p2p are botted the shit out of in numbers that are insane. Just got back from Tzharrs, there were 198 bots all wearing the same Armour.

As I said , I can’t really train my stats , school and stuff…
Plus the fact that I have to share 1 pc with my mom and little brother…

@IlikeArrays
Back then bots were kind of rare…
Now its rare to see a place unhabited by bots…

Read full topic
